original_title: 呪いのご当地都市伝説～北海道・東北編～
overview: First installment in a series about famous local urban legends. This installment includes 'Turbo-Granny', 'Gomiko-san' and a story about a delivery person who hears a story of an old woman disappearing on the Tohoku Expressway.
title: Cursed Local Urban Legends: Hokkaido & Tohoku Edition
